    • Method Detail

      • getBoardGameInfo

        public List<BoardGameExtended> getBoardGameInfo(int id)
                                         throws BggException
        Get information on a board game
        Parameters:
        id - The BGG ID number
        Returns:
        List of boardgames that match the supplied ID
        Throws:
        BggException - Custom exception containing failure code

      • getBoardGameInfo

        public List<BoardGameExtended> getBoardGameInfo(ThingType type,
                                                int id,
                                                List<IncludeExclude> includes,
                                                List<IncludeExclude> excludes)
                                         throws BggException
        Get information on a "thing" (board game, expansions or accessories)
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the "thing" to get information about
        id - The ID of the thing
        includes - List of additional information to include
        excludes - List of items to Exclude from the query
        Returns:
        List of boardgames that match the query
        Throws:
        BggException - Custom exception containing failure code

      • getCollectionInfo

        public CollectionItemWrapper getCollectionInfo(String username,
                                               String id,
                                               List<IncludeExclude> include,
                                               List<IncludeExclude> exclude,
                                               boolean includeExpansions)
                                        throws BggException
        Get information on a users collection
        Parameters:
        username - The user to get the collection of
        id - Get information on a specific game, can be null or zero
        include - Flags to include items in the search
        exclude - Flags to exclude items in the search
        includeExpansions -
        Returns:
        A wrapper class with the list of collection items
        Throws:
        BggException - Custom exception containing failure code

      • searchBoardGame

        public SearchWrapper searchBoardGame(String query,
                                     boolean exact,
                                     boolean includeExpansions)
                              throws BggException
        Search BGG for the game name
        Parameters:
        query - The item query to search for
        exact - Search for the exact query
        includeExpansions - Include expansions in the search
        Returns:
        A wrapper class with the search responses
        Throws:
        BggException - Custom exception containing failure code
